name: Discord Amoled Theme
description: [IMPORTANT]: Please frequently revisit this page and update the style every now and then. (I no longer use the web app as often as the windows app but every once in a while, I'll come back to see if anything was broken) Customize Discord's appearance to an easing dark amoled theme. This is still in development, so expect bugs etc. Feedback is greatly appreciated, so if you've found any issues, you can leave a review and I'll get back to it as soon as possible. Additional Images: Channel Colours User Settings Guild Settings
additional_info: [30/8/2022]: Fixed the home and forum background colours [05/6/2022]: Fixed the delete message modal message background colour [02/2/2022]: Fixed the sidebar on the reaction viewer modal. [17/1/2022]: Fixed slash commands and emoji autocomplete pickers [14/1/2022]: Fixed some of the broken things. [6/1/2022]: Fixed channel search popup colours. (sorta) [24/11/2021]: Changed search text colour in guild discovery page. [21/11/2021]: Fixed delete message colours [28/10/2021]: Added guild-discovery to the link regex [20/10/2021]: Changed role autocomplete colours in channel permissions pages [16/10/2021]: Changed url matching to a regexp [13/10/2021]: Fixed transparent modals [13/10/2021]: Fixed the friends list colours [13/10/2021]: Fixed emoji autocomplete colours [6/10/2021]: Changed channel name colour to be more grey [6/10/2021]: Fixed muted channel colours to be more visible
